name: Rising Room
description: Welcome to Rising Room where the goal is to survive as long as possible and gain the highest score. You must go from room to room every 10 seconds before the room you're in falls back into the depths with you on it. There are many different rooms that can be summoned, rooms will have crystals that will increase your score. Your score will also increase when ever a new room is summoned or you claim a power-up. I hope you enjoy Rising Room.
